summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 discussing coordination for interviews with potential victims of Jeffrey Epstein in Florida. An FBI Victim Specialist is communicating with others to arrange assistance and meetings following scheduled interviews in West Palm Beach and Miami.

persons.name: Victim Specialist
persons.context: FBI Victim Specialist based at the Miami Headquarters and Homestead Resident Agency, coordinating assistance for potential Epstein victims and communicating about interview schedules.

persons.name: Case Agent
persons.context: Mentioned as heading to Florida and having interviews scheduled for Thursday with potential Epstein victims.

connections.description: Both are FBI personnel coordinating on the Epstein case, with the Victim Specialist being informed by the Case Agent about victim interviews.

events.title: Scheduled victim interviews
events.description: Interviews with potential Epstein victims were scheduled for 11 AM and 3 PM, requiring coordination for victim specialist assistance.

events.title: Case Agent travel to Florida
events.description: The FBI Case Agent was reported to be heading to Florida in preparation for victim interviews.

keyFacts: FBI was actively conducting interviews with potential Epstein victims in Florida in July 2019.
A Victim Specialist was coordinating post-interview support for victims.
Interviews were scheduled for specific times (11 AM and 3 PM) on July 11, 2019.
The communication highlights procedural coordination within the FBI regarding victim assistance.
The email chain shows ongoing investigative activity shortly before Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
